com.example.shoutout.util

Class DateTimeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.shoutout.util.DateTimeUtil

  • public class DateTimeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of date- and time-related utility methods.
    Since:
    April 29, 2021

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.text.SimpleDateFormat LONGER_DATE_FORMAT
      Slightly longer date format donning the pattern of MMM, d, yyyy.
      private static java.text.SimpleDateFormat SIMPLE_DATE_FORMAT
      Compact date format donning the pattern of M/d/yyyy.

    • Constructor Summary

      static java.lang.String formatLongerDate(java.util.Date date)

      static java.lang.String formatSimpleDate(java.util.Date date)

    • Field Detail

      • SIMPLE_DATE_FORMAT

        private static final java.text.SimpleDateFormat SIMPLE_DATE_FORMAT
        Compact date format donning the pattern of M/d/yyyy. So the following examples would correspond:
        • 1/1/2000
        • 6/7/1900
        • 2/20/2038

      • LONGER_DATE_FORMAT

        private static final java.text.SimpleDateFormat LONGER_DATE_FORMAT
        Slightly longer date format donning the pattern of MMM, d, yyyy. So the following examples would correspond:
        • Jan 1, 2000
        • Jun 7, 1900
        • Feb 20, 2038

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateTimeUtil

        public DateTimeUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • parseSimpleDate

        public static java.util.Date parseSimpleDate(java.lang.String str)
        Parse a date format corresponding to SIMPLE_DATE_FORMAT
        Parameters:
        str - The pre-formatted date to parse
        Returns:
        The parsed date. Will return null if string could not be parsed.

      • formatSimpleDate

        public static java.lang.String formatSimpleDate(java.util.Date date)
        Format a Date object into a string according to SIMPLE_DATE_FORMAT.
        Parameters:
        date - The date object to format
        Returns:
        The string-formatted date

      • formatLongerDate

        public static java.lang.String formatLongerDate(java.util.Date date)
        Format a Date object into a string according to LONGER_DATE_FORMAT.
        Parameters:
        date - The date object to format
        Returns:
        The string-formatted date
